original_title: Japan’s Finance Minister Suzuki to visit Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Japan’s Finance Minister Suzuki Shunichi will visit Sri Lanka on 11-12 January, the island’s foreign ministry said.
During the visit, the Japanese Finance Minister is scheduled to have official discussions with President Ranil Wickremesinghe and Minister of Foreign Affairs Ali Sabry.

Suzuki and the delegation will visit Parliament, Jayawardene Centre, Sri Jayawardenepura Hospital, Colombo Dockyard and Lanka Nippon Biztec Institute in Maharagma during their stay in Sri Lanka. (Colombo/Jan8/2024
